snippet: The daily-deal company did not turn around its struggling European business in the third quarter, and confirmed that it had laid off about 80 employees.
abstract: Groupon reports third-quarter net loss of $3 million, break-even on a per-share basis, up from net loss of $54.2 million, or 18 cents a share, in year-ago quarter; company's stock has shed nearly 80 percent of its value since making its public debut at $20 per share.
lead_paragraph: The daily-deal company did not turn around its struggling European business in the third quarter, and confirmed that it had laid off about 80 employees.

headline.seo: Groupon Earnings Miss Expectations on Weakness in Europe
